awd_titl_txt: "IUTAM Symposium on Computational Mechanics of Materials"   to be held June 15-18, 1993
awd_abstract_narration: This grant is for the partial support of an international (IUTAM)               symposium on computational mechanics of materials to be held                    during June 15-18, 1993 at Brown University, Providence Rhode                   Island, U.S.A.  The symposium will allow the presentation of                    state-of-the-art research findings in the area of computational                 mechanics of materials to the most outstanding and active workers               in that emerging field from academe, government laboratories and                industry.  This field differs in scope from other branches of                   computational mechanics by placing a heavy emphasis on                          micromechanics and material characterization and design.  It also               utilizes methodologies not employed in other segments of                        computational mechanics.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
